about.confirm: To confirm my studies in the courses and their successful completion, I am attaching a certificate and screens of the progress of my studies from my personal course cabinet
about.description: I am a full-stack web developer with a passion for building beautiful and functional websites

fifth.description: Considering my previous experience of working with a large number of people of different age groups, I have acquired strong communication skills, conflict resolution abilities, and the ability to handle various situations
fifth.title: Communication skills

first.description: I was the head of a children's dance studio, founded my own stretching studio, and worked on team projects as a Scrum Master and Team Lead. I believe this is enough to define my level of organization, proactivity, and responsibility
first.title: Responsibility

forth.description: I always plan my time and often arrive early for meetings, events, and other commitments. I value both my own time and other people
forth.title: Punctuality

second.description: I do everything to the fullest extent and take the initiative to do even more. I always conscientiously finish tasks assigned to me
second.title: Hard work

seventh.description: I am a positive person who always seeks the best in every person and situation
seventh.title: Kindness

sixth.description: Since there is a lot of stress in our lives, I have learned to stay focused and work effectively in stressful situations
sixth.title: Stress resistance

third.description: When I faced with difficulties, I don't give up. On the contrary, challenges push me to increase my skills and knowledge
third.title: Perseverance

about.github: Also, to highlight my desire for learning, improving skills and self-improvement, I am adding activity statistics for the 2023 - 2024 years
about.title: Prysiazhna Anastasia

first.text: Explore a diverse collection of my creative endeavors, including web design, JavaScript / TypeScript and mini projects. Each project shows my creativity, attention to detail, and passion for delivering visually stunning and engaging experiences
first.title: Responsive Design

second.title: Code Quality

third.subtitle: Evaluate the original approach
third.text: Dive into my problem-solving skills and logical thinking. Explore how I approach challenges, find innovative solutions, and adapt to emerging technologies. Discover my commitment to continuous learning and improvement, ensuring every project meets high-quality standards and exceeds expectations
third.title: Creative Projects

hero.description: I’m a person with a passion for creating modern, functional, and user-friendly web applications. Over the past year, I’ve been working on building responsive interfaces and maintaining dynamic web systems. I’m always exploring new technologies and finding ways to improve my skills. From developing user experiences to optimizing workflows, I love taking on challenges and finding the best way to get things done. If you’re curious about the work I’ve done, take a look at my Projects page — it’s packed with some of my favorite projects and ideas I’ve brought to life.
hero.subtitle: general information
